author: ETA PRIME
description:
Recently on the channel we built a super low-cost gaming PC under $350 that can handle 1440p gaming—and in that first video we installed Windows 11 and tested a bunch of games. (Link to that video is down below.)
In THIS video, we’re taking the same setup and running official SteamOS (Steam Deck OS / Holo) to see how it performs, what works, and what limitations you might run into—plus why a Radeon GPU is the way to go if you’re planning SteamOS/Bazzite/other Linux builds.
